mapper.select: /* UserMapper.findUserCredentialsByUsername 조회 */ select a.user_id , a.username , a.password , a.name , b.role_name from user a left join role b on a.role_id = b.role_id where a.username = #{username}
/* UserMapper.existsByUsername 조회 */ select exists (select username from user where username = #{username})
/* UserMapper.findAll 조회 */ select a.user_id , a.username , a.name , a.tel_no , a.fax_no , b.role_name , a.reg_dt from user a left join role b on a.role_id = b.role_id
/* UserMapper.findByUserId 조회 */ select a.user_id , a.username , a.name , a.tel_no , a.fax_no , b.role_name , a.reg_dt from user a left join role b on a.role_id = b.role_id where user_id = #{userId}

/* UserMapper.userListByGrid 조회 */ select ROWNUM() as rnum , count(*) over() as total_count , a.user_id , a.username , a.name , a.tel_no , a.fax_no , b.role_name , a.reg_dt from user a left join role b on a.role_id = b.role_id LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
